body_html:
some dumb questions:

  • since we got rid of WITH_CAFFE2, does that mean pytorch build will find and include Eigen and other Caffe2 libs? I dont see us preserving the "minimal caffe2" part via setup.py or on the cmake invocation
  • why are we shipping *.a now, in setup.py
body_text:
some dumb questions:

since we got rid of WITH_CAFFE2, does that mean pytorch build will find and include Eigen and other Caffe2 libs? I dont see us preserving the "minimal caffe2" part via setup.py or on the cmake invocation
why are we shipping *.a now, in setup.py
body:
some dumb questions:

- since we got rid of WITH_CAFFE2, does that mean pytorch build will find and include Eigen and other Caffe2 libs? I dont see us preserving the "minimal caffe2" part via setup.py or on the cmake invocation
- why are we shipping *.a now, in setup.py
